welcome_message_body: Welcome to Uijeongbu, Korea, South! Known for its beautiful temples, vibrant markets, and stunning natural scenery, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our charming city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gimpo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Gimpo Airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
